name: Unlayer
headline: Unlayer makes embeddable email and web editing software.
description:
Unlayer makes embeddable email and web editing software. We provide the essential editing tools that companies need to create successful marketing and engagement campaigns.

If you want to add a rich email template editor, web page builder, or popup builder into your application, try Unlayer.

founders.name: Adeel Raza, Founder
founders.description: I'm a serial technology entrepreneur with strong product focus.

generated_description:
Unlayer is a software startup focused on making embeddable email and web editing tools. Founded in 2017 and backed by Y Combinator in their W22 batch, Unlayer is based in San Francisco and operates with a team of 35 employees. Their mission? To provide the essential editing tools that companies need to create successful marketing and engagement campaigns.

Think of Unlayer as a platform where businesses can easily integrate high-quality drag-and-drop builders for emails, landing pages, and even popups. This means if you're looking to enhance your SaaS application with robust content creation features without diving deep into complex engineering, Unlayer's your go-to solution. Their offerings include an email builder, a page builder, and a document builder, all customizable and user-friendly.

One of the standout features of Unlayer is its enterprise-grade reliability and security. The company boasts a 99.9% uptime and is SOC 2 compliant, assuring clients of their commitment to security and performance. This has attracted over 1,000 companies, including notable names like Netflix and Fidelity, who trust Unlayer for their critical content workflow.

Unlayer’s appeal is not just in what they build but also how they build it. Their developer-friendly platform is designed with modern tech stacks in mind, promoting clean code and seamless integration across various frameworks—be it React, Angular, or vanilla JS. They provide a robust API that includes webhooks and type definitions, ensuring that developers can implement Unlayer's tools quickly and efficiently.

For companies looking to reduce development time and costs—by as much as 52% in some cases—Unlayer positions itself as a strategic partner. Their tools empower teams to focus on what they do best while leaning on Unlayer for powerful content creation capabilities.  

In essence, Unlayer is more than just a software tool; it’s a productivity enhancer for SaaS platforms aiming to streamline content workflows. Whether you’re a small startup or a larger enterprise, Unlayer is geared to help you launch faster while maintaining high-quality content production. 

You can check them out at [unlayer.com](https://unlayer.com) and see how they can revolutionize your content creation process.
